mapper.select: SELECT username, avatar, b.tag_id, b.name, b.create_time FROM user u INNER JOIN ( SELECT op.tag_id, t.name, op.operator_id, op.create_time FROM theme_operation op INNER JOIN tag t ON op.tag_id = t.id WHERE op.theme_id = #{themeId} and t.state = #{state} and op.type = 2 ORDER BY op.create_time DESC LIMIT 1 ) b ON u.id = b.operator_id ORDER BY b.create_time DESC
